parse.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Motion Picture Trilogy - Extended Edition (Blu-ray)

links.*: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
The Lord of the Rings (film series)

wikitext.*:
{{incomplete}}
'''The Lord of the Rings: The Motion Picture Trilogy - Extended Edition''' is a Blu-ray pack of [[The Lord of the Rings (film series)|''The Lord of the Rings'' film series]] released on June 28, 2011 by [[New Line Cinema]]. It includes the extended editions of the films in high-definition and nine DVDs of bonus features. ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring|The Fellowship of the Ring]]'' also received a remaster from the 2K digital files, supervised by director [[Peter Jackson]] and cinematographer [[Andrew Lesnie]]. It received a perfect user rating on multiple sites including blu-ray.com.
